source.779d5b83:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

fig2=plt.figure(figsize=(4, 5), dpi=70)
data = [30, 28, 8,38]

colors = ("c", "m", "#fc0373","#fce803")
labels = ("A", "B", "AB","O")
percentage_format = "%1.1f%%"
plt.pie(
    data, labels=labels,autopct=percentage_format ,
 colors=colors,shadow=True)
fig2.suptitle('Numbers of blood groups', fontsize=20)
plt.show()
source.63c35b66:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
x=[5,7,8,7,2,11,2,9,4,11,12,9,6]
y=[99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86]
fig3=plt.figure()
ax3=fig3.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
ax3.scatter(x,y)
ax3.set_xlabel('years of experience')
ax3.set_ylabel('annual salary of UXdesigners')
ax3.set_title('UX designers salary',fontsize=20)

plt.show()
